name: check-worktree
description: Warn if attempting to write code while on main branch

hooks.command: branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ "$branch" = "main" ] || [ "$branch" = "master" ]; then echo 'WARNING: You are on the main branch. Create a worktree first: git worktree add -b feat/feature-name ../repo-feat-feature-name main'; exit 1; fi
